DOCNAME: CASE OF KOLEVATOV AND OTHERS v. RUSSIA
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 3 - Prohibition of torture (Article 3 - Degrading treatment) (Substantive aspect);Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Civil proceedings;Article 6-1 - Fair hearing);Violation of Article 13 - Right to an effective remedy (Article 13 - Effective remedy)
TEXT: CARDINAL . NORP The list of applicants and the relevant details of the applications are set out in the appended table .
CARDINAL . The applicants complained of the inadequate conditions of their detention . Some applicants also raised other complaints under the provisions of the Convention .
